topic.title: How to Add Line Numbering in Code Blocks

p.note: This topic refers only to the transformation type.

body.p: You can add line numbering to make your code snippets easier to read. In the DITA topics, set the outputclass attribute on the codeblock elements to the show-line-numbers value.
body.note: It is possible to use the outputclass="show-line-numbers" together with any of the language outputclass value (e.g. outputclass="language-java show-line-numbers").
